item.title: Wont work for ::master
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“cbk666, post:1, topic:320061”]I know this might be kinda noobie lol but i forget how to do the ::master for all skills.

My code now looks like this.

} else if (cmd[0].equals(“master”)) {
for(int i = 0; i < p.skillLvl.length; i++) {
if(i == 0 || i == 1) {
p.addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}

And i want it for all 24 skills. It only does it for attack and defence. Any help?[/quote]

That’s because you’re checking if the iterator, ‘i’ equals 1 or two, and if it does, it adds the XP. Use this…:

if(cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("master")) { for(int i=0; i<24; i++) { p.addSkillXP(Integer.MAX_VALUE, i); } }

Read full topic
